text: Mady Villiers (born 26 August 1998) is an English cricketer. In July 2019, she was named in England's squad for the Women's Twenty20 International (WT20I) fixtures of the 2019 Women's Ashes series. She made her WT20I for England against Australia on 31 July 2019. In November 2019, she was named in England's Women's One Day International (WODI) squad for their series against Pakistan. In January 2020, she was named in England's squad for the 2020 ICC Women's T20 World Cup in Australia. On 18 June 2020, Villiers was named in a squad of 24 players to begin training ahead of international women's fixtures starting in England following the COVID-19 pandemic. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:English women cricketers Category:England women Twenty20 International cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Mady Villiers
